summary: Enhanced onboarding flow with multi-option 'What's next?' menu on All Set screen
Added prerequisite gating for advanced onboarding steps
Implemented dynamic user name detection from git config
Added explanatory content including welcome banner and 'How JAT works' section

suggestedTasks.title: Add comprehensive test coverage for onboarding flow
suggestedTasks.description: Create unit and integration tests to validate the new onboarding flow components. Focus on testing prerequisite gating logic, user name detection, and menu interactions. Use mock git configurations to ensure robust name detection across different scenarios.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of existing test coverage for new onboarding features

suggestedTasks.title: Document new onboarding flow user experience changes
suggestedTasks.description: Update user documentation to explain the new onboarding flow, including the 'What's next?' menu, prerequisite gating, and automatic git config name detection. Create screenshots and step-by-step guidance for new users.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure users understand the new onboarding experience

patterns: Use git config for user profile population

documentationNeeds: Create screenshots of new onboarding flow
